perturbation.original_text: Oaktree US hereby confirms the appointment of the Sub-Advisor as sub-investment manager and sub-advisor to the Funds and to provide the services set out in Clause 2, and the Sub-Advisor accepts such appointments, on the terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Oaktree US hereby confirms the appointment of the Sub-Advisor as sub-investment manager and sub-advisor to the Funds and to provide the services set out in Clause 2, and the Service Provider accepts such appointments, on the terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'Sub-Advisor' and 'Service Provider' are used interchangeably in the contract, leading to confusion about the scope of duties of each party and potentially creating conflicting interpretations. It is unclear if they are the same entity or two different entities and what role the 'Service Provider' has.

perturbation.original_text: In consideration of the provision of services under this Agreement, Oaktree US will pay the Sub-Advisor such fees as may be agreed between the parties from time to time (the "Service Fee").
perturbation.changed_text: In consideration of the provision of services under this Agreement, Oaktree US will pay the Sub-Advisor such compensation as may be agreed between the parties from time to time (the "Service Fee").
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'fees' and 'compensation' are used interchangeably, potentially impacting how payments are classified for tax or accounting purposes. This can lead to disputes over the exact nature and calculation of the payment.

perturbation.original_text: If Oaktree US has any complaint about the performance of the Sub-Advisor it must notify the Sub-Advisor Compliance Officer in writing at the address notified in accordance with Clause 13.2 of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: If Oaktree US has any issue about the performance of the Sub-Advisor it must notify the Sub-Advisor Compliance Officer in writing at the address notified in accordance with Clause 13.2 of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'complaint' and 'issue' are used interchangeably, potentially impacting how the complaints procedure is interpreted or implemented. 'Complaint' has a stricter legal connotation than 'issue' thus making the process ambiguous.
